choose.when: INSERT INTO SEARCH_LOG(LOG_IDX, UNIQUE_ID, SEARCH_KEYWORD) VALUES (LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uniqueId}, #{searchKeyword})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO SEARCH_LOG(LOG_IDX, USER_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD) VALUES (LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userIdx}, #{searchKeyword})

choose.when: SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM ( SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId} AND IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY SEARCH_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
choose.otherwise: SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM ( SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY SEARCH_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

choose.when: SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD, IS_DELETED FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId} ORDER BY SEARCH_DATE DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT LOG_IDX, SEARCH_KEYWORD, IS_DELETED FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY SEARCH_DATE DESC

choose.when: UPDATE SEARCH_LOG SET IS_DELETED = 1 WHERE LOG_IDX = #{logIdx} AND UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId} AND IS_DELETED = 0
choose.otherwise: UPDATE SEARCH_LOG SET IS_DELETED = 1 WHERE LOG_IDX = #{logIdx} AND USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND IS_DELETED = 0
